    • Method Detail

      • perPage

        public MessageRequest.Builder perPage(int perPage)
        Sets message count per page. Default value is 10.
        Parameters:
        perPage - Message count per page. This value should be in the range [1..100].
        See Also:
        page(int)

      • page

        public MessageRequest.Builder page(int page)
        Sets target page of messages. The newest message will be at page 1. Default value is 1.
        Parameters:
        page - Target page. This value should be bigger than 1.
        See Also:
        perPage(int)

      • oldestDate

        public MessageRequest.Builder oldestDate(Long oldestDate)
        Sets oldest date of request messages. The messages sent in the oldest date wouldn't be included.

        The value represents the unix time in millisecond.

        Ignore this method will disable this filter.
        Parameters:
        oldestDate - oldest date

      • latestDate

        public MessageRequest.Builder latestDate(Long latestDate)
        Sets latest date of request messages. The messages sent in the latest date wouldn't be included.

        The value represents the unix time in millisecond.

        Ignore this method will disable this filter.
        Parameters:
        latestDate - latest date

      • order

        public MessageRequest.Builder order(String order)
        Sets the order of request messages. Messages will be requested by this order of Message creation time. Default value is MessageRequest.DESCENDING_ORDER.

        The order must be one of the following:

        • MessageRequest.ASCENDING_ORDER
        • MessageRequest.DESCENDING_ORDER
        Parameters:
        order - the order of Message creation time

      • build

        public MessageRequest build()
        Creates a MessageRequest by this builder.
